overview: Product Designer, he created the first interactive newspaper supported by Apple in 1994. Creator of AIREM Design in 1998, his company produces interactive products and websites in the fields of training, publishing, sales and marketing for companies and organizations. Active in the industry to remain at the forefront of technology, he shares his experience and is involved in many developments. He convinced one of the best interior designers in the world to have its website on iPad in 2010 to be closer to its customers. To offer to all, it creates the web service tabFolio.me it launches in 2012.
